content: k2tog around 10 sts decrease key and abbreviations round 2 knit mc - main colour work rounds 1-2 until 40 sts remain 4 sts in each section cc1 - contrast colour 1 then work round 1 two more times 20 sts cc2 - contrast colour 2 next round k2tog around 10 sts cc - contrast colour finishing break yarn leaving a 6 tail thread tail through dpns - double pointed needles remaining stitches and pull tight to close weave in all ends k - knit wet block the hat to adjust size and even out fair-isle pattern k2tog - knit two sts together and enjoy p - purl st s - stitch es i heart rainbows hat from 9 months of knitting 2 in-depth tutorials irresistible knits excellent support by emily wessel and alexa ludeman fabulous free patterns check out the simple collection www tincanknits com © tin can knits 2011
